verbs.description: Acting Veteran Affairs Secretary Robert Wilkie [V: was] picked by President Donald Trump to permanently lead the troubled department .
[ARG1: Acting Veteran Affairs Secretary Robert Wilkie] was [V: picked] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] [ARGM-PRP: to permanently lead the troubled department] .
[ARG0: Acting Veteran Affairs Secretary Robert Wilkie] was picked by President Donald Trump to [ARGM-ADV: permanently] [V: lead] [ARG1: the troubled department] .
